title: Transitions observed for regions of EM spectrum

content.question: The diagram above represents the absorption spectrum for a pure molecular substance. Which of the following correctly indicates the type of transition observed for the substance in each of the regions of the absorption spectrum?

choices.label:
Region X
 Region Y
 Region Z

Molecular vibration
 Molecular rotation
 Electronic transition

Region X
 Region Y
 Region Z

Electronic transition
 Molecular rotation
 Molecular vibration

Region X
 Region Y
 Region Z

Molecular rotation
 Molecular vibration
 Electronic transition

Region X
 Region Y
 Region Z

Electronic transition
 Molecular vibration
 Molecular rotation

content.answer:
Region X
 Region Y
 Region Z

Electronic transition
 Molecular vibration
 Molecular rotation

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
